title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.5 - Brakes and functioning two-way radio required on all aircraft
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1271.5 - Brakes and functioning two-way radio required on all aircraft

State Regulations

No aircraft may land or take off at the air terminal
unless it is equipped with brakes and a functioning radio capable of direct
two-way communication with the control tower, except in the case of an
emergency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1271.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
